byEmail.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user'
    emit doc.email.toLowerCase(), null

byUsername.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user'
    emit doc.username.toLowerCase(), null

byCreation.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user'
    emit doc.created, doc.username

byId.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user'
    emit doc._id, null

waitingForSummary.map:
(doc)->
  if doc.type is 'user'
    acceptsSummaries = doc.settings.notifications['inventories_activity_summary'] isnt false 
    if acceptsSummaries
      lastSummary = doc.lastSummary or doc.created
      summaryPeriodicity = doc.summaryPeriodicity or 20
      nextSummary = lastSummary + summaryPeriodicity*24*3600*1000
      emit nextSummary, null
